metadata.title: CVE-2024-36940 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: core: delete incorrect free in pinctrl_enable()The "pctldev" struct is allocated in devm_pinctrl_register_and_init().It's a devm_ managed pointer that is freed by devm_pinctrl_dev_release(),so freeing it in pinctrl_enable() will lead to a double free.The devm_pinctrl_dev_release() function frees the pindescs and destroysthe mutex as well.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
